page.title: 01TRANSPORT
page.content: { { The main line of the railway line from {London to Cornwall}passes through our area it is the section inside{Plymouth just after the{Brunel}bridge over the {Tamar.}The line is a very busy main line carrying a great mixture of traffic.The main line express 125 trains pass through, local passenger trains, local freight and china clay trains from St Austell to the potteries. {ROADS}The main road into Plymouth is Wolseley Road and this carries a great deal of traffic especially at rush hours when the dockyard employees are travelling. The biggest problem is in the summertime when thousands of people travel over the bridge into Cornwall for their holidays.
